content: use yarn from your stash for this easy granny square tree 6 granny squares in different sizes are crocheted first you could start with the largest and then decrease one round for each subsequent square or start with your smallest and increase a round for each square the trunk of the tree is crocheted next finally you ll add your embelishments choosing your colors and your preference of embelishments gives a unique tree every time pattern includes instructions for the classic granny square assembly instructions are easy to follow gauge isn t important but maintaining your gauge is > this pattern is free to view on my website https //www jerasjamboree co uk/handmade-christmas-tree-wall-hanging/ /details skill level easy / advanced beginner us terminology uk terminology /materials 4mm/ g6 crochet hook yarn from your stash scissors yarn needle choice of embelishments /stitches and abbreviations used uk crochet terms double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet us crochet terms single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet chain = chain st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch skip = skip repeat = repeat copyright @ jera s jamboree 2023 no part of this pattern may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted
